name: line_format
author: johnsonfung
description: Format the current line with various text transformations (uppercase, lowercase, camelCase, snake_case, etc.)

commands.name: uppercase_line
commands.description: Convert the current line to UPPERCASE.

commands.name: lowercase_line
commands.description: Convert the current line to lowercase.

commands.name: sentence_case_line
commands.description: Convert the current line to Sentence case.

commands.name: title_case_line
commands.description: Convert the current line to Title Case.

commands.name: camel_case
commands.description: Convert the current line to camelCase.

commands.name: snake_case
commands.description: Convert the current line to snake_case.

commands.name: kebab_case
commands.description: Convert the current line to kebab-case.

commands.name: remove_quotes_line
commands.description: Remove surrounding quotes from the current line.
